titleStmt.title: Dyets dry dinner consisting of eight seuerall courses: 1. Fruites 2. Hearbes. 3. Flesh. 4. Fish. 5. whitmeats. 6. Spice. 7. Sauce. 8. Tabacco. All serued in after the order of time vniuersall. By Henry Buttes, Maister of Artes, and fellowe of C.C.C. in C.
titleStmt.author: Butts, Henry, d. 1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Tho. Creede, for William Wood, and are to be sold at the west end of Powles, at the signe of Tyme,

notesStmt.note: The words "1. Fruites .. 8. Tabacco." are bracketed together on the title page.
The first leaf is blank except for large type ornament and signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
